title: How do I read HTML <input> values (values set by javascript) into servlet? It returning NULL
body:
I have written a JSP, where I am creating a form.
In this form I am setting the <input> values using Javascript.
When I submit the form, the data should be fed to a servlet. But its not happening. Its giving me all NULL.

The JSP form:

<!--Edit Profile Modal -->
    <div id="editProfileModal" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
      <div class="modal-dialog">
      <!-- Modal content-->
      <div class="modal-content">
      <form method="post" action="Edit_profile" enctype="multipart/form-data">
        <div class="modal-header">
        <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">×</button>
        <div class="medium">
          <h4 class="modal-title">Edit Profile</h4>
        </div>
        </div> 
        <div class="modal-body">
        <table class="table table-condensed">
          <tbody>
            <tr>
              <td>Name</td><td><input type="text" class="form-control" id="dataName" name="Name" value=""></input></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>Mobile</td><td><input type="text" class="form-control" id="dataPhone" name="dataPhone"></input></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>Total Experience</td><td><input type="text" class="form-control" id="dataTotExp" name="dataTotExp"></input></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>Email</td><td><input type="text" class="form-control" id="dataEmail" name="dataEmail"></input></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>Location</td><td><input type="text" class="form-control" id="dataLocation" name="dataLocation"></input></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>External/TCS-Internal</td>
              <td>
                <select class="form-control" id="dataPrfType" name="dataPrfType">
                  <option value="0">TCS Internal</option>
                  <option value="1">External</option>
                </select>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>Domain</td>
              <td>
                <select class="form-control" id="dataDomain" name="dataDomain">
                  <option value="0">Hadoop</option>
                  <option value="1">ETL</option>
                </select>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>Assigned To</td>
              <td>
                <select class="form-control" id="dataAssignedTo" name="dataAssignedTo">
              <%  itr = interviewers.iterator();
                int i=0;
                while(itr.hasNext()) { %>
                  <option value="<%=i%>"><%=(String)itr.next()%></option>
              <%    i++;
                } %>

                </select>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>Status</td>
              <td>
                <select class="form-control" id="dataStatus" name="dataStatus">
                  <option value="0">unscheduled</option>
                  <option value="1">scheduled</option>
                  <option value="2">cleared</option>
                  <option value="3">on-hold</option>
                  <option value="4">not-recommended</option>
                </select>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td>Interviewer Comments</td><td><textarea rows="3" class="form-control" id="dataComments" name="dataComments"></textarea></td>
            </tr>
          </tbody>
        </table>
        <div class="row">
          <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12">
            <hr>
          </div>
        </div>
        <p>Candidate's CV.</p><br/>
        <span id="dataCvPath" name="dataCvPath"></span>
        <input type="hidden" id="dataPath" value="" name="dataPath"></input>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">
        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Save</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
        </div>
        </form>
      </div>

      </div>
    </div>
    <!--/.Edit Profile modal -->

The Javascript that is setting the values in the form above is:

<script type="text/javascript">
function getData(data)
{
    var arr = data.split("#");
    document.getElementById("dataPath").value = arr[0];
    document.getElementById("dataName").value = arr[1];
    document.getElementById("dataPhone").value = arr[2];
    document.getElementById("dataTotExp").value = arr[3];
    document.getElementById("dataEmail").value = arr[4];
    document.getElementById("dataLocation").value = arr[5];
    document.getElementById("dataCvPath").innerHTML = arr[10];
    document.getElementById("dataComments").value = arr[11];

    var textToFind = arr[6];
    var dd = document.getElementById('dataPrfType');
    for (var i = 0; i < dd.options.length; i++) {
        if (dd.options[i].text === textToFind) {
            dd.selectedIndex = i;
            break;
        }
    }


    textToFind = arr[7];
    var dd = document.getElementById('dataDomain');
    for (var i = 0; i < dd.options.length; i++) {
        if (dd.options[i].text === textToFind) {
            dd.selectedIndex = i;
            break;
        }
    }

    textToFind = arr[8];
    dd = document.getElementById('dataAssignedTo');
    for (var i = 0; i < dd.options.length; i++) {
        if (dd.options[i].text === textToFind) {
            dd.selectedIndex = i;
            break;
        }
    }

    textToFind = arr[9];
    dd = document.getElementById('dataStatus');
    for (var i = 0; i < dd.options.length; i++) {
        if (dd.options[i].text === textToFind) {
            dd.selectedIndex = i;
            break;
        }
    }
}
</script>

And in the servlet I am simply printing the parameters:

public void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException 
    {
        response.setContentType("text/html"); 

        String name = (String)request.getParameter("Name");
        String phone = request.getParameter("dataPhone");
        String totExp = request.getParameter("dataTotExp");
        String email = request.getParameter("dataEmail");
        String location = request.getParameter("dataLocation");
        String prfType = request.getParameter("dataPrfType");
        String domain = request.getParameter("dataDomain");
        String assignedTo = request.getParameter("dataAssignedTo");
        String status = request.getParameter("dataStatus");
        String comments = request.getParameter("dataComments");
        String prfPath = request.getParameter("dataPath");
        String cv = request.getParameter("dataCvPath");

        System.out.println("Name: "+name
                +"\nPhone:"+phone
                +"\ntotExp: "+totExp
                +"\nemail: "+email
                +"\nProfile Type: "+prfType
                +"\nComments: "+comments
                +"\nProfile Path: "+prfPath
                +"\nCV: "+cv);
    }

But output is all null in Tomcat console:

Name: null
Phone:null
totExp: null
email: null
Profile Type: null
Comments: null
Profile Path: null
CV: null

What am I missing??
